Title: Lynch Pin
Plot: Bette travels to New York on a business trip. Tina is shocked and angry about her lawyer's true intentions. Jenny and Shane search for a new roommate, and Kit bonds with an inspirational speaker.
GuestStars: Daniela Buzzi,  Cassandra Sawtell,  Heather Douglas,  Audra Ricketts,  Gina Holden,  Joe Towne,  Sam Easton,  Tina Milo Milivojevic,  Zoran Vukelic,  Julie Patzwald,  Matthew McInnis,  Sarah Lind,  Marnie Robins
